::BAttera::

"NO, he's right. I'm just a predacon."  She looked at Rex, "I'll 
bother you no more.  I'll be in my quarters. When your leader 
arrives, please let me know so I may see him."

She lowered her head and walked down the hall way to her room.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm/Rex::
> 
> Firearm smiles at Battera. "Sure, the residential are of the sh-"
> 
> "Showing her all our security measures, Firearm?" Rex interrups, 
walking into 
> the bridge, "I'm glad to see you arn't giving her self destruct 
codes," he 
> finishes sarcastically, ignoring Battera as he walks up to Firearm.
> 
> Firearm looks at but confused. "I don't know them."
> 
> Rex growls. "That's not the point, you idiot! She's a Predacon, a 
poten..." 
> Rex trails off, realizing that he had let his prejudice run off 
with him 
> again, "Oh fine! Show her how to disable the shields for all I 
care!"
> 
> Rex angirly walks over to a chair, sitting down and looking at the 
screen. 
> Firearm looks at him, and then turns to Battera. "Sorry about that, 
Rex has a 
> temper."
